rule: Each description must include a portrayal of the background, outlining the setting or environment in which the subjects are situated.
input: In the backdrop, an ancient castle stands atop a hill surrounded by foggy moors and a dense forest under a cloudy sky.
coverage: An ancient, weathered stone castle towers atop a grassy hill, its gothic architecture featuring tall spires and intricate carvings. Surrounding the hill are expansive, foggy moors that blend into a dense, dark forest under a heavy, cloudy sky. The scene is set during the early morning with soft, diffuse lighting that casts a mystical glow over the landscape. The background includes rolling hills and shadowy trees, evoking an eerie and enchanting atmosphere.
validityText:
